# printInfo

**Instance Property**

The printing information object used when the page layout panel is run.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var printInfo: NSPrintInfo? { get }
```

## Discussion

The NSPrintInfo object is set using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/beginSheet(with:modalFor:delegate:didEnd:contextInfo:)] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/runModal(with:)] method. The shared NSPrintInfo object is used if the receiver is run using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPageLayout/runModal()].

## Accessing the printing information

- **NSPrintInfo**: An object that stores information that’s used to generate printed output.
- **NSPageLayout.Result**
